thread.title: Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet
thread.title_full: Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet

title: Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet
text:
Social Impact Cruises Will Take You Beyond the Buffet By Mia Taylor | 08/20/15 - 01:15 PM EDT Reprint 
NEW YORK ( MainStreet ) â€” Cruise ship vacations are known for many things -- with bountiful buffets and overeating, over-the-top Broadway-style entertainment, discos and casinos as just some of their typical hallmarks. 
They are not however, well-known for highlighting social causes, providing daily volunteer opportunities for travelers or emphasizing selfless giving as the primary vacation activity. Carnival Corporation ( CCL - Get Report ) is poised to change all that with the launch of its new brand, Fathom, a cruise that does not involve any of the industry's usual attractions. 
Fathom cruises, which will begin sailing early next year, are being designed as social impact vacations, and will focus on creating transformative improvements in the ports it visits and on mobilizing and educating its travelers. 1 of 6
